document.full_text: massachusetts' economic growth surged ahead of the overall united states in the first quarter of 2011, buoyed by the state's technology-intensive industries, a report said on thursday.
document.title: massachusetts q1 growth more than double slow u.s. pace
lines_and_colors: massachusetts' economic growth surged ahead of the overall united states in the first quarter of 2011, buoyed by the state's technology-intensive industries, a report said on thursday.
